author: Harry Craddock
description: A great grassy, minty digestif with a good balance between acidity and sweetness.
name: Mint Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
(There's no need to muddle mint if a good shake and ice is used
